entry.title: Rose Gold Frame LED Lighted Dressing Mirror, 26 X 63 Inch, CCT Remembrance, Touch Sensor Switch, Realx Style
entry.summary:
Vendor: LEDMyplace Canada
Type: LED Vanity Mirrors
Price: 1987.50

Add an aesthetic by installing Front W26'' X H63 ' LED vanity mirror of Realx Style to your dark, dingy bathroom and transform it into an inviting space. The clean and futuristic appearance of LED Bathroom Mirrors makes them ideal for contemporary interiors. This mirror is featured with an inbuilt Defogger, touch switch control, CCT remembrance, and waterproof features. This is the ETL-listed LED vanity mirror that provides you with a clear, crisp, and flawless reflection and comes with  5 years manufacturer warranty.
entry.s:tag: 26 X 63 Inch LED Lighted Dressing Mirror

entry.title: LED Backlit Mirror with Thin Plexiglass Edge, 55.1 X 25.6 Inch, Touch Sensor Switch, Defogger, CCT Remembrance, Titan Style
entry.summary:
Vendor: LEDMyplace Canada
Type: LED Vanity Mirrors
Price: 1903.20

Add an aesthetic by installing Front W51.1'' X H25.6 ' LED vanity mirror of Titan Style to your dark, dingy bathroom and transform it into an inviting space. The clean and futuristic appearance of LED Bathroom Mirrors makes them ideal for contemporary interiors. This mirror is featured with an inbuilt Defogger, touch switch control, CCT remembrance, and waterproof features. This is the ETL-listed LED vanity mirror that provides you with a clear, crisp, and flawless reflection and comes with  5 years manufacturer warranty.

Defogger is the special feature of the LED Vanity Mirror that helps to remove the fog that gets collected on the mirror. It saves time for manually cleaning the mirror. The Defogger is not controlled through the switch on the mirror. The switch only controls the LED Light on the mirror to turn on and off or to change CCT. If you wish to switch the defogger off, you will have to turn the switch off or take the plug off of the outlet. The temperature of the defogger will always be 59-68 degrees more than the room temperature. To elaborate, let’s say if your room temperature is 59 degrees Fahrenheit then the temperature of the defogger would be 86-95 degrees Fahrenheit.

entry.title: LED Bathroom Mirror Medicine Cabinet, Double Sided Mirror, On/Off Switch, Hector Style
entry.summary:
Vendor: LEDMyplace Canada
Type: LED Vanity Mirrors
Price: 811.50 - 1674.20 (3 variants)

Make your bathroom adorable and luxurious by installing a Hector-style LED Vanity mirror. The mirrors feature premium-quality LED lights rated with 50,000 operational hours and come with five years of manufacturer's warranty. The mirrors' design includes a Double-sided mirrored door and glass shelves that feature an on/off switch and high CRI. These LED mirror cabinets will serve three functions:   a lighting fixture, storage space, and a mirror. which means that the wiring in the mirrors is safe by a bathroom's standards. These LED mirror cabinets highlight a simple yet useful design that will amalgam with and adorn your bathroom's existing decór.
